title: Cube Stories: Escape
description: Cube Stories: Escape is an adventure point-and-click puzzle game that guides you into the depths of an abandoned mansion shrouded in mystery. You are a fearless video blogger on an adrenaline-fueled journey to uncover the truth behind a haunting urban legend. With every step you take, the eerie atmosphere tightens its grip, and the mansionâ€™s shadowy corridors pull you deeper into the unknown. As you journey through the dimly lit rooms, cryptic puzzles and hidden clues await, each one unraveling more of the dark secrets concealed within the mansion's ancient walls. Your quick thinking and sharp wits are the only tools between you and this forsaken house's mysteries.
